casebody.data:
Noel Reyes MATA, petitioner,
v.
Eric H. HOLDER, Jr., Attorney General. No. 14-185. Supreme Court of the United States Jan. 16, 2015.

Opinion

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit granted. William Peterson, Esquire, of Houston, Texas, is invited to brief and argue this case, as amicus curiae , in support of the judgment below.
